about.name: Name

projects.project1: Horizon is a modern a banking app with a finance management dashboard that connects multiple bank accounts, displays real-time transactions, and allows you to transfer money to other users on the platform.
projects.project2: Modern YouTube Clone Application. This project is a clone of the YouTube website with a modern design and features like video playback
projects.project3: KD School is a multipage educational frontend website that provides information about the school, courses, teachers, and contact information.
projects.project4: Xpertacademy is a modern e-learning platform that offers a wide range of courses in various fields. The platform allows users to enroll in courses, take quizzes, and earn certificates upon completion.
